snippet.description:

snippet.title: That's Entertaining: After the Thanksgiving feast
snippet.description:
* Although I love to cook Thanksgiving dinner, I have to confess to enjoying post-Thanksgiving meals even more. At our house the lunches and suppers that follow the big Thursday feast are often impromptu and composed of dishes improvised from the bounty of leftovers.
http://www.cnn.com/2000/FOOD/news/11/23/thanksgiving.pear.lat/index.html

snippet.title: CNN Food Central A chat with chef Mark Pierce on Thanksgiving cooking
snippet.description:
* CNN Mark Pierce, Head Chef at foodvision.com and President of Fool Proof Gourmet Products joined a CNN.com chat to share tips and techniques for preparing a Thanksgiving dinner. Pierce joined the chat via telephone from Dallas, Texas on November 19, 1999. CNN.com provided a typist. The following is an edited transcript of that chat.
http://www.cnn.com/FOOD/news/9911/23/thanksgiving.transcript/index.html

snippet.title: T minus 6: A laid-back guide to Thanksgiving
snippet.description:
